text:
Just like Sakuya said! The moves are perfect!
All that's left is to add a smile and it'll be even better!

I know I should smile...... but......
it's hard......

I see......? Then maybe just try
lifting the corners of your mouth for now......!

The instructor said to "smile" here,
but I think it means to look relaxed and confident.

......!
Great......! That expression really got my heart racing.
Haha, this could be a new possibility!
